description:
Be it luck or skill, Tai seems to falter under pressure.  The team needs three wins to 
proceed and their upcoming opponents are new and trained by an old friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hito ni wa Tsuge yo Ama no Tsuribune
To Tell the People in the Capital That I Make for the Islands
ひとにはつげよ あまのつりぶね
